entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker Focused/Unfocused Events Do Not Fire on Android #28121
  • Explicit Style in ContentPage Crashes on Android in Release Build Only #28120
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view issues #28118
  • [Android] UI labels are cut off when embedded in a layout (twice or more?) at specific DPI and screen resolution values. #28117

Closed

  • Unloaded and Loaded events get called multiple times #20595
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements #28119
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android #28116
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView Does Not Scroll When EmptyView Exceeds Screen Size - fix #28094
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28093
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
